Author: maybethisistherealme
Text: Yes, I hate those pictures. (Btw why do people only wear underwear, which is extremely baggy, in those before pictures) Whenever I see someone who is literally only skin and bones, probably has a BMI of about 10 I think I can’t *really* have an eating disorder, even though I’ve been counting calories for about four years now, my weight fluctuated between 65 and 46 kg, my hair is falling out and at one point I lost my period. But I don’t think I should need help because I’ve never had a BMI below 16.5.

Author: jayrambling
Text: That's exactly the reason that I hate people who post pictures of them at their lowest for their "awareness" post. When I see that shit it's obvious that they haven't fully recovered despite what they say. They're looking for validation in an awful way
